class.name: PLATEAUVectorTile
class.description: PLATEAUVectorTile contains information about a downloaded map tile including its coordinate, local image path, and download status. This class is fully available on all platforms including mobile (iOS/Android).

method.name: is_success
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the tile was downloaded successfully.

method.name: load_image
method.description: Load the tile image as a Godot [Image].

method.name: load_texture
method.description: Load the tile image as an [ImageTexture].

members.member: Local path to the downloaded image file.
